verses.verse: ( Majestic Is His Work) הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> hal·lū Hallelujah יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yāh ...! ( Or Hallelu YAH, meaning Praise the LORD. This psalm is an acrostic poem, each line beginning with the successive letters of the Hebrew alphabet.) אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> ’ō·w·ḏeh I will give thanks יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> bə·ḵāl with all לֵבָ֑ב <WH3824> lê·ḇāḇ my heart בְּס֖וֹד <WH5475> bə·sō·wḏ in the council יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> yə·šā·rîm of the upright וְעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> wə·‘ê·ḏāh and in the assembly.

גְּ֭דֹלִים <WH1419> gə·ḏō·lîm Great מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śê are the works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD; דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים <WH1875> də·rū·šîm they are pondered לְכָל־ <WH3605> lə·ḵāl by all חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2656> ḥep̄·ṣê·hem who delight in them.

הוֹד־ <WH1935> hō·wḏ- Splendid וְהָדָ֥ר <WH1926> wə·hā·ḏār and majestic פָּֽעֳל֑וֹ <WH6467> pā·‘o·lōw is His work; וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> wə·ṣiḏ·qā·ṯōw His righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> ‘ō·me·ḏeṯ endures לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> lā·‘aḏ forever.

זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> zê·ḵer to be remembered; עָ֭שָׂה <WH6213> ‘ā·śāh He has caused לְנִפְלְאֹתָ֑יו <WH6381> lə·nip̄·lə·’ō·ṯāw His wonders חַנּ֖וּן <WH2587> ḥan·nūn is gracious וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> wə·ra·ḥūm and compassionate. יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD

טֶ֭רֶף <WH2964> ṭe·rep̄ food נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> nā·ṯan He provides לִֽירֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> lî·rê·’āw for those who fear Him; יִזְכֹּ֖ר <WH2142> yiz·kōr He remembers לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām forever. בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1285> bə·rî·ṯōw His covenant

כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> kō·aḥ the power מַ֭עֲשָׂיו <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śāw of His works הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> hig·gîḏ He has shown לְעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> lə·‘am·mōw His people לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> lā·ṯêṯ by giving לָ֝הֶ֗ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) them נַחֲלַ֥ת 5159 N-fsc ( na·ḥă·laṯ) the inheritance גּוֹיִֽם׃ 1471 N-mp ( gō·w·yim) of the nations.

מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śê The works יָ֭דָיו <WH3027> yā·ḏāw of His hands אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> ’ĕ·meṯ are truth וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> ū·miš·pāṭ and justice; נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים <WH539> ne·’ĕ·mā·nîm are trustworthy. כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃ <WH6490> piq·qū·ḏāw His precepts

סְמוּכִ֣ים <WH5564> sə·mū·ḵîm They are upheld לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> lā·‘aḏ forever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām and ever, עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם <WH6213> ‘ă·śū·yim enacted בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> be·’ĕ·meṯ in truth וְיָשָֽׁר׃ <WH3477> wə·yā·šār and uprightness.

פְּד֤וּת׀ <WH6304> pə·ḏūṯ redemption שָׁ֘לַ֤ח <WH7971> šā·laḥ He has sent לְעַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> lə·‘am·mōw to His people; צִוָּֽה־ <WH6680> ṣiw·wāh- He has ordained לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām forever; בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> bə·rî·ṯōw His covenant קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> qā·ḏō·wōš holy וְנוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> wə·nō·w·rā and awesome שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> šə·mōw is His name.

רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית <WH7225> rê·šîṯ is the beginning חָכְמָ֨ה׀ <WH2451> ḥāḵ·māh of wisdom; יִרְאַ֬ת <WH3374> yir·’aṯ The fear יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD שֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> śê·ḵel understanding. ט֭וֹב <WH2896> ṭō·wḇ [gain] rich לְכָל־ <WH3605> lə·ḵāl all עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> ‘ō·śê·hem who follow [His precepts] תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8416> tə·hil·lā·ṯōw His praise עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> ‘ō·me·ḏeṯ endures לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> lā·‘aḏ forever!
